Title: Establishes a moratorium on the siting of sewer sludge processing facilities
Summary: Establishes a moratorium upon the siting of sludge processing facilities in this state, including any facility which converts sewer sludge including but not limited to human waste, farm animal waste, and food waste, such as yogurt by-products, into a bio-solid fertilizer.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a moratorium on the siting of sewer sludge processing facilities in the state
